title: Jean-Marc Vallée Might Direct ‘Big Little Lies’ For HBO
text:
Jean-Marc Vallée Might Direct ‘Big Little Lies’ For HBO 
Published By: Slashfilm.com - Today 
Any name actor probably wants to work with Jean-Marc Vallée right now. With Dallas Buyers Club, the director helped land Oscar wins for b... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
